title: Junior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a junior software engineer with experience in Python and Flask. You will help build and maintain web applications.

title: Data Analyst
description: Join our analytics team to create dashboards, analyze trends, and support data-driven decision-making. Familiarity with Python and SQL is essential.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We're seeking an ML Engineer to build production-ready NLP pipelines. Strong Python and TensorFlow skills required.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop and maintain modern user interfaces using React. Work closely with designers and backend developers to create responsive applications.

title: Backend Developer (Django)
description: We're hiring a backend developer to build and maintain RESTful APIs using Django. Experience with databases and scalable applications preferred.
